metadata.title: CVE-2017-16879 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the _nc_write_entry function intinfo/write_entry.c in ncurses 6.0 allows attackers to cause a denial ofservice (application crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via acrafted terminfo file, as demonstrated by tic.

criterions.comment: ncurses: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
